* Wiskott - Aldrich syndrome: A rare X-linked recessive primary immunodeficiency disorder characterized by eczema, thrombocytopenia, and recurrent infections. (<https://rarediseases.org/rare-diseases/wiskott-aldrich-syndrome/>)
* Severe combined immunodeficiency syndrome: A group of rare genetic disorders caused by mutations in genes that control the development and function of immune cells. (<https://medlineplus.gov/ency/article/001609.htm>)

All three identified names are confirmed as diseases.
